discussion.p: In , the declaration of system_clock::rep says "see below", but there is nothing below that describes it.

blockquote.p: I.e. this is standardeze for "system_clock::rep is signed". Perhaps an editorial note along the lines of:
blockquote.blockquote: -2- system_clock::duration::min() < system_clock::duration::zero() shall be true. [Note: system_clock::rep shall be signed. -- end note].

discussion.blockquote: We agree with the direction of the proposed resolution. Move to NAD Editorial.

resolution.blockquote: -2- system_clock::duration::min() < system_clock::duration::zero() shall be true. [Note: system_clock::rep shall be signed. -- end note].
